text: Nando Angelini (17 August 1933) is an Italian actor. He has appeared in more than eighty films since 1957. He was born in San Benedetto del Tronto, Italy. His best known roles were in Il Sorpasso, Barabbas and Bloody Pit of Horror. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:People from Marche
title: Nando Angelini
